categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A battle at Reytha was an engagement during the New Republic liberation campaign after the Battle of Endor. In the year 6 ABY, the New Republic sent part of the Third Fleet under the command of Admiral Willham Burke from Kashyyyk into the Expansion Region, where they attacked the planet Reytha. Admiral Burke commanded the naval forces, while General Brenn Tantor led the ground forces to a victory over the Imperials. Upon learning of the defeat at Reytha, Imperial forces abandoned the nearby planets Gyndine and Cyrillia and retreated to the Core Worlds.
